series_name: Immedia SatinSheet 2Dir. BaseSheet - MAXI - satin sheet full length
original_description: SatinSheet 2 direction helps the partially self-reliant user to get in and out of bed as well as to turn and get to the edge of the bed. The edge of the sheet ensures that the user can sit stably on the edge of the bed and that the duvet does not slide over the edge.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Immedia SatinSheet 2Dir. BaseSheet - MAXI is a specialized satin sheet designed to assist partially self-reliant individuals in managing their mobility in bed. This sheet features a two-directional design that facilitates easier movement for users who need assistance getting in and out of bed, as well as turning and reaching the edge of the bed. The satin material provides a smooth surface that reduces friction, making it easier for users to shift positions. Additionally, the edge of the sheet is designed to ensure stability when sitting on the edge of the bed and prevents the duvet from sliding off, providing comfort and security.
goals: Promote autonomy in daily living
Optimize mobility and movement efficiency
Maximize comfort and safety during bed rest
Minimize reliance on caregivers

original_description: Microphone in Audinor wireless microphone system.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Audinor T3.2 is a wireless microphone system designed to enhance hearing and communication for individuals with hearing impairments. This device is part of the Audinor system, which includes a microphone and a receiver that can be connected to hearing aids or cochlear implants. The microphone is small and discreet, designed to be worn by a speaker to transmit sound directly to the listener's hearing device. The system operates on a wireless frequency, ensuring clear and uninterrupted sound transmission. It is particularly useful in environments where background noise is high or where distance between the speaker and listener is significant. The Audinor T3.2 is designed to improve the quality of life for individuals with hearing challenges by making communication easier and more effective.
goals: To optimize speech comprehension in diverse settings.
To facilitate active engagement in social and professional contexts.
To alleviate the burden and exhaustion associated with hearing difficulties.
To foster autonomy and self-assurance in everyday tasks.
healthcare_challenges: Difficulties in understanding speech in noisy environments.
Challenges in communicating effectively in large groups or public settings.
Need for assistive listening devices to support hearing aids or cochlear implants.

original_description: The products Top-Dry system provides optimal comfort and skin integrity. The breathable and anatomically shaped pads maintain the health of the skin and have an excellent fit. All products are equipped with horizontal leakage barriers that provide extra protection, and an odor system that minimizes unpleasant odors.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Abena San Premium bladder protection pads are designed with a Top-Dry system that ensures optimal comfort and skin integrity. These pads are breathable and anatomically shaped to maintain skin health and provide an excellent fit. They feature horizontal leakage barriers for extra protection and an odor system to minimize unpleasant odors. Each pad is individually wrapped for convenience and hygiene. The package contains 30 pads suitable for both men and women, offering invisible leakage protection.
goals: Promote personal cleanliness and comfort
Improve overall well-being through unobtrusive protection
Support skin health and prevent complications
Empower independence and self-assurance in various social contexts

original_description: The Vivo is easy to disassemble so you can take it with you wherever you go. Its very small turning radius makes the Vivo easy to manoeuvre, while its wide tyres give it an extremely high degree of stability. Its rear suspension provides unique comfort.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Vivo electrical scooter is designed for mobility and ease of use. It features a comfortable, adjustable seat with armrests for support. The scooter is easy to disassemble, making it highly portable and convenient for travel. Its small turning radius allows for excellent maneuverability in tight spaces, while wide tires ensure stability. The rear suspension system provides a smooth and comfortable ride, making it ideal for various terrains. The scooter also includes a basket for carrying personal items, and its compact design makes it suitable for both indoor and outdoor use.
goals: Promote autonomy and self-reliance through enhanced mobility
Improve overall well-being by minimizing the impact of physical mobility limitations
Foster social connections and community integration through increased accessibility
healthcare_challenges: Mobility impairments due to aging or physical disabilities
Recovery from surgery or injury requiring temporary mobility assistance
Managing chronic conditions that affect physical strength and mobility

original_description: Can be used both for skin and nails.

LLM_output.detailed_description: Skin and nail scissors are multi-purpose tools designed for ease of use and precision when grooming. The scissor features a comfortable grip handle, which is particularly useful for individuals with dexterity challenges. The blades are sharp and well-suited for trimming nails and skin carefully.
goals: Promote personal autonomy and self-care through effective grooming tools.
Enhance overall well-being and self-esteem by maintaining personal hygiene.
Minimize the risk of health complications by ensuring proper skin and nail care.
healthcare_challenges: Arthritis and other conditions affecting hand dexterity.
Physical impairments that limit the ability to be precise when reaching delicate areas for grooming.

original_description: Ultralight active wheelchair with the need for easy with swing-away height adjustable footrests for easy transfer and transport. As standard model with adjustable balance and foldable height and angle adjustable backrest, height and angle adjustable footrests and removable side panels or customized individually.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The W5 D is an ultralight active wheelchair designed for users who require easy transfers and transport. It features swing-away height-adjustable footrests, making it convenient for users to move in and out of the chair. The wheelchair comes with several adjustable components, including a foldable backrest and height and angle-adjustable footrests. Additionally, it has removable side panels, allowing for customization to suit individual needs. This wheelchair is ideal for users who need a lightweight and versatile mobility solution.
goals: Promote autonomy in daily living
Maximize mobility and accessibility
Streamline transfers and transportation
Personalize mobility equipment for optimal functionality

original_description:
A specs switch that can be mounted where citizens want it placed.
The specs switch is connected to the toilet and a light touch, initiated the personal set washing / drying program. An easily accessible and user-friendly solution. The specs switch diameter is 3.5 cm (35mm)

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Specs Switch for washing toilets is an innovative assistive technology designed to enhance accessibility and convenience in personal hygiene. This switch can be mounted at a user's preferred location, making it easily accessible for individuals with limited mobility or dexterity. The switch is connected to the toilet and is activated with a light touch, initiating the user's pre-set washing and drying program. Its compact design, with a diameter of 3.5 cm (35mm), ensures that it does not occupy much space while providing a user-friendly solution for maintaining personal cleanliness.
goals: To promote autonomy and dignity in personal hygiene
To foster independence in daily personal care routines
To optimize comfort and convenience in personal hygiene practices
healthcare_challenges: Mobility impairments that limit access to toilet controls
Dexterity issues that make it difficult to operate standard toilet controls
Conditions that require assistance with personal hygiene tasks

original_description:
Slim rollator, for indoor and outdoor use. 
Only 52 cm/20,4 in width with an improved brake system, and a safe adjustment of the handle height. User max weight is 100kg/15 stones/10lb and 7.4 oz.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Hafnia Rollator is a versatile mobility aid designed for both indoor and outdoor use. With a compact width of 52 cm (20.4 inches), it is particularly suitable for navigating narrow spaces. This rollator features an enhanced brake system for safety and a secure mechanism for adjusting the handle height to suit the user's needs. It supports a maximum user weight of 100 kg (15 stones/220 lbs). The rollator includes a comfortable seat for resting and a basket at the front for carrying personal items.
goals: Promote autonomy and mobility for continued engagement in daily activities.
Prioritize safety and fall prevention during routine tasks.
Enable social integration and community involvement despite mobility limitations.
Enhance overall well-being through consistent and dependable mobility support.
healthcare_challenges: Mobility impairments due to aging or physical disabilities.
Recovery from surgery or injury that affects walking ability.
Conditions such as arthritis, osteoporosis, or multiple sclerosis that impact mobility.
Obesity or other health conditions that require a mobility aid for safe movement.

original_description: Bloclup placed on flat surfaces / reading material can be used with high additions, collects the light. Comes in a bag

LLM_output.detailed_description: The SCHWEIZER Bright Field Magnifiers is a high-quality optical aid designed to enhance visibility and readability of small text or objects. This magnifier is particularly useful for individuals with visual impairments or those who require closer inspection of materials. The device is designed to be placed on flat surfaces, such as tables or desks, and can be used in conjunction with high additions or reading glasses. Its unique design collects ambient light, which improves the clarity and brightness of the magnified image. The magnifier comes with a protective bag for easy storage and transportation.
goals: To promote visual accessibility for diverse tasks
To foster autonomy in daily activities
To facilitate engagement in detail-oriented hobbies and activities
To provide comfort for tasks that require extended viewing time or long reading

series_name: Base Comfort - wrist bandage with volar bar
original_description: Base comfort wrist bandage with splint brace (palm side) has a wrist shape to achieve optimal fit. Base comfort wrist bandage closes with 5 velcro straps on the back of the hand. Base comfort wrist bandage has a malleable aluminum rail and is made of a stable material with soft lining.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Base Comfort wrist bandage with splint brace is designed to provide optimal support and stability to the wrist. Featuring a wrist shape for a precise fit, this bandage includes a malleable aluminum rail on the palm side to offer effective immobilization. It secures with five velcro straps on the back of the hand, ensuring a snug and adjustable fit. The bandage is constructed from a durable yet comfortable material with a soft lining, making it suitable for extended wear and promoting healing and comfort.
goals: Maximize autonomy in daily tasks
Minimize pain and discomfort
Facilitate recovery and rehabilitation from wrist injuries
Preventing or managing conditions like contractures
Enhance overall well-being
healthcare_challenges: Arthritis and other degenerative joint diseases

original_description: With its smart, triangular design, Edge shower stool fits well in smaller spaces or shower corners. Users can straddle the seat for increased stability. Another option is to lower one leg slightly and straddle the seat over this corner. This way the seat angle opens and can relieve an aching hip.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Etac Edge shower stool is a versatile and space-efficient mobility aid designed for use in bathrooms and showers. Its triangular shape allows it to fit neatly into corners, making it ideal for smaller spaces. The stool features a perforated seat for drainage and can be straddled for increased stability. Additionally, one leg can be adjusted to a lower height, enabling the user to straddle the seat at an angle, which can help alleviate hip discomfort. The stool is constructed with a durable, easy-to-clean material and has non-slip feet for safety.
goals: Promote autonomy in personal care activities
Minimize the risk of accidents and injuries in the bathroom environment
Optimize comfort and mobility during showering
Enhance overall well-being through safe and accessible bathroom solutions
Help alleviate hip discomfort while doing personal care activities
healthcare_challenges: Conditions affecting personal hygiene and self-care

original_description: These panties are perfect for women experiencing light incontinence. Panties are made of a nylon/spandex microfiber knit. Similar to other styles, these panties have Agion antimicrobial fibers, which reduce the bacteria that cause odor and include a sewn-in super absorbent Unique-DriTM pad which traps liquid for all-day built-in protection

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Smooth High Leg Panties are designed with both comfort and functionality in mind. These panties are ideal for women experiencing light incontinence, offering built-in protection throughout the day. Crafted from a soft nylon/spandex microfiber knit, they ensure a smooth and comfortable fit. A key feature is the inclusion of Agion antimicrobial fibers, which help reduce bacteria that cause odor. Additionally, these panties feature a sewn-in super absorbent Unique-DriTM pad that effectively traps liquid, providing all-day protection without the need for additional products.
goals: Promote autonomy and self-reliance in personal care
Enhance daily comfort and self-assurance
Minimize the frequency of undergarment changes
Improve overall well-being through discreet incontinence management
healthcare_challenges: Discreet and hygienic management for incontinence

series_name: Side rail cover for OPUS 5 (care bed and hospital bed)
original_description: Soft Side Rail cover in white nappa with 8 mm foam lining. Easily placed over the top tube on the Side Rail and closed with velcro. Washable with soft soap.Used for greater comfort and safety, particularly when users are psysically challenging.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Side Rail cover for OPUS 5 is designed to enhance the comfort and safety of users in care beds and hospital beds. Crafted from soft white nappa material with an 8 mm foam lining, this cover provides a cushioned barrier for added protection. It is easily placed over the top tube of the side rail and secured with velcro, ensuring a snug fit. The cover is washable with soft soap, making it easy to maintain hygiene and cleanliness. Ideal for users who require additional support and safety, this side rail cover is particularly beneficial for those who are physically challenged.
goals: To promote safety and comfort in bed-bound scenarios
To mitigate risks associated with falls or impacts
To optimize sleep quality and restfulness

original_description:
Seat cushion that provides a good weight distribution. The egg-baked surface makes it comfortable to sit and distributes the weight well. Detachable coat that can be washed by hand. The pillow is suitable for both the office chair, wheelchair, at home or on the journey.
The pad measures 37 x 42 x 7.6 cm

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Sero Pressure Office Cushion is a versatile and comfortable seat cushion designed to provide excellent weight distribution. Featuring an egg-crate surface, it offers superior comfort and support, making it ideal for use on office chairs, wheelchairs, or during travel. The cushion comes with a detachable cover that is machine-washable for easy cleaning and maintenance. Measuring 37 x 42 x 7.6 cm, it is suitable for a variety of seating environments, ensuring comfort and support throughout the day.
goals: Promote optimal posture and alignment during extended periods of sitting
Maximize comfort and ergonomics in various settings
Minimize the risk of pressure-related injuries and discomfort
Enhance overall wellness and performance
healthcare_challenges: Musculoskeletal conditions affecting the back and spine

series_name: SAFE Med Arm or Leg support, pressure relief,choose 50 or 70 cm long
original_description:
SAFE Med Arm support and Leg support for pressure relief and for pressure distribution and pain relief in visco-elastic SAFE ViscoPore foam in Yellow soft. For arm or leg to get pressure relief for the elbow or for the heel.
Machine wash up to 95 C, tumble dry. To buy cover separately.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The SAFE Med Arm or Leg support is a versatile assistive device designed to provide pressure relief and distribute pressure effectively. Crafted from visco-elastic SAFE ViscoPore foam, this support comes in a bright yellow color, offering both comfort and visibility. Ideal for relieving pressure on the elbow or heel, it is suitable for use on either the arm or leg. The device is easy to maintain, as it can be machine washed at temperatures up to 95°C and tumble-dried. For added convenience, covers can be purchased separately.
goals: To optimize comfort and minimize discomfort during extended periods of rest or activity.
To promote autonomy and self-sufficiency by addressing pressure-related discomfort.
To enhance overall well-being by delivering effective pressure relief solutions.
healthcare_challenges: Management of conditions that cause discomfort or pain in specific body areas.
Support for individuals with limited mobility or those at risk of pressure injuries.

Magnification: 4, 5, 6, 8, 10, 12 
Charger (with plugs for EU, GB, US, AUS) 
USB cable 
SD card (supplied preinstalled) 
Case

It includes a charger with international plugs (EU, GB, US, AUS), a USB cable, a preinstalled SD card, a protective case, a cleaning cloth, and a lanyard for easy portability. series_name: RAM Mounts Universal X-Grip holder til 10 tommer tablets
original_description: This holder ensures simple and safe mounting of your tablet or similar device.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The RAM Mounts Universal X-Grip holder is designed to securely mount tablets ranging from 9 to 10 inches. This robust holder features a patented design with four spring-loaded legs that grip the device firmly, ensuring it stays in place even during rough conditions. The holder is compatible with various RAM mounting systems, allowing for versatile placement in vehicles, on desks, or other surfaces. Its durable construction and adjustable angles make it suitable for both personal and professional use, providing convenience and accessibility for users on the go.

original_description: Glas with a easy grip design.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Rillekrus is a uniquely designed glass that features a textured, ridged exterior, providing an easy grip for users. This glass is made of durable, transparent material, ensuring both functionality and aesthetic appeal. Its design is particularly beneficial for individuals who may struggle with gripping traditional smooth glasses, making it an excellent choice for those with dexterity challenges. The glass is suitable for various beverages and can be a stylish addition to any table setting while offering practical support.

series_name: Sitter Seat with 5-point harness, Special Tomato
original_description: Sitter Seats in 5 sizes and 2 colours. Available from 1 year and up, or from 9 kg and up to 90 kg.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Sitter Seat with 5-point harness, Special Tomato, is a versatile and secure seating solution designed to support children from 1 year old (or from 9 kg up to 90 kg). This seat features a robust 5-point harness system that ensures the child's safety and comfort. The Special Tomato model is designed with a sleek and modern aesthetic, making it suitable for various environments. The seat is constructed with durable materials to withstand frequent use and is easy to clean, ensuring hygiene and longevity. Ideal for use at home, in educational settings, or during travel, this sitter seat promotes independence and stability for young children.

original_description: Would you like to go out in Danish forests and at the same time have a scooter that can handle everyday tasks - then our R8 model.The biggest model in electric scooters. You get the largest engine (1400w, 2 75 ah battery), up to 60km range on a charge, digital instrumentation, led light, so you can see in dark, swivel leather seat with armrest

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Damos R8 is a robust and versatile electric mobility scooter designed for both outdoor adventures and everyday use. Equipped with a powerful 1400W motor and a 275Ah battery, it offers an impressive range of up to 60km on a single charge, making it ideal for long trips. The scooter features digital instrumentation for easy monitoring and LED lights to ensure visibility in dark conditions. Its swivel leather seat with armrests provides comfort and support during use. The R8 is built to handle various terrains, making it suitable for both urban environments and outdoor trails.
goals: Promote autonomy and exploration in diverse environments
Improve overall well-being through dependable and comfortable transportation
Facilitate engagement in outdoor activities and maintain an active lifestyle
healthcare_challenges: Mobility impairments that affect walking and standing
Need for reliable and long-lasting transportation solutions
Conditions requiring comfortable and supportive seating

original_description: Hand grip that are attached with suction cups, making it well suited to the bathroom.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Hand Grip with Suction Cup is a versatile and essential assistive device designed to enhance safety and stability in the bathroom. This device features a sturdy hand grip with a comfortable, ergonomic design that is easy to hold. The grip is securely attached to a powerful suction cup, which can be firmly mounted on smooth, non-porous surfaces such as tiles or glass. Ideal for use in showers, bathtubs, or near toilets, this hand grip provides additional support to prevent slips and falls, making it particularly useful for individuals with mobility challenges, the elderly, or those recovering from injuries. The device is easy to install and remove, ensuring flexibility and convenience in various bathroom settings.
goals: Promote autonomy and safety in personal care activities
Minimize the risk of accidents and injuries in bathroom environments
Improve mobility and self-assurance in utilizing bathroom facilities
healthcare_challenges: Recovery from surgeries or injuries affecting mobility
Conditions that affect stability and coordination

original_description:
Plastic waterproof trousers are soft and comfortable. Made of PVC.
 Wash at max. 60 degrees. Do not tumble dry.

LLM_output.detailed_description: Plastic fixation pants protect from leaks and spills and are designed to be waterproof and comfortable. These pants are made from PVC material, ensuring durability and ease of cleaning. They are suitable for various applications, including medical and personal care settings. The pants can be washed at a maximum temperature of 60 degrees Celsius and should not be tumble-dried to maintain their quality and functionality.
goals: Promote personal hygiene and comfort in healthcare environments
Facilitate independent living and ease of daily activities
Support autonomy for individuals with urinary incontinence

original_description:
The Musical Teddy Bear Arthur has a soft and luxurious fur. He is not only good company and can give comfort, he can also play music for the user.
His left paw has a poke button. Give it a squeeze and youll feel a little click. The click starts or stops the music and is the only control you use on a daily basis.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Musical Teddy Bear Arthur is a high-quality, cuddly companion designed to provide comfort and entertainment. With his soft and luxurious fur, Arthur is perfect for snuggling and offering a sense of security. Arthur's unique feature is his musical capability, which can be activated by a simple squeeze of his left paw. A gentle click starts or stops the soothing music, making it an intuitive and enjoyable experience for the user. This interactive element makes Arthur not just a toy, but a source of comfort and engagement.
goals: To promote emotional well-being through a comforting and interactive companion
To provide a sense of security and companionship, reducing feelings of loneliness
To facilitate stress and anxiety management through calming and relaxing activities
To encourage independence and self-soothing through an accessible and intuitive mechanism
healthcare_challenges: Autism spectrum disorders (for sensory and calming effects)
Dementia and Alzheimer's (for soothing and familiar comfort)

original_description:
Smart and protective case.
Practical case for your Doro Handleasy 326/328 GSM or HandlePlus 326i GSM.
- Can be attached to belt.
- Safe magnetlock.
- Real leather.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Case for Doro mobile phone is a smart and protective case designed specifically for the Doro Handleasy 326/328 GSM or HandlePlus 326i GSM models. Crafted from real leather, this case offers a premium feel and durability. It features a practical design that allows it to be securely attached to a belt, ensuring easy access and portability. The case is equipped with a safe magnet lock, providing additional security to keep the phone safely in place. This case not only enhances the aesthetic appeal of the phone but also offers protection against daily wear and tear.
goals: Boost self-esteem and personal expression
Preserve the longevity of electronic devices

original_description:
Non-slip rubber mat on roll, 20 cm wide x 2 m long.
Non-slip rubber backing, with many applications. It can be used during service, kitchen utensils, games, playground, etc.
Cleaned in soapy water and drip dried.
Available in different colors.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Dycem Non-Slip mat on roll is a versatile and highly effective non-slip solution designed to enhance safety and stability in various environments. Measuring 20 cm wide and 2 meters long, this mat features a non-slip rubber backing that provides excellent grip and traction. Ideal for a multitude of applications, it can be used in service industries, kitchens, playgrounds, and more. The mat is easy to clean, requiring only soapy water and a drip dry. Available in a variety of colors, it adds both functionality and aesthetic appeal to any setting.
goals: Promote overall safety and accident prevention
Ensure stability and security for vulnerable individuals
Optimize workspace and kitchen functionality and safety
Facilitate a safe and engaging play environment for children
healthcare_challenges: Being prone to slips and falls due to mobility issues for both children and adults

Object handling for individuals with grip issues

original_description:
RotoBed Trolley, is a good tool for transporting and storing a RotoBed upright. It is specially designed for RotoBed care beds. Easy to assemble without the use of tools.
RotoLift can lift RotoBed upright without the use of muscle power. CE certified and approved by the Danish Technological Institute. Used in combination with RotoBedTrolley.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The RotoBed Trolley and Lift system is a specialized assistive technology designed to facilitate the transportation and storage of RotoBed care beds. The trolley is easy to assemble without the need for any tools and is specifically engineered to accommodate the unique dimensions and weight distribution of RotoBed care beds. The RotoLift component can lift the RotoBed into an upright position effortlessly, eliminating the need for manual labor and reducing the risk of injury. Both the trolley and lift are CE certified and have been approved by the Danish Technological Institute, ensuring their safety and reliability. This system is particularly useful in healthcare settings where ease of movement and storage of care beds are crucial.
goals: Minimize injury risk for caregivers and patients
Optimize medical equipment storage and transportation
Enhance safety and comfort in healthcare environments
healthcare_challenges: Caregiver strain and injury from manual lifting
Safe and efficient handling of medical beds

original_description: Audinor DUO is a complete communication system based on a wireless microphone (T2) and neckloop receiver (R1).

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Audinor DUO system is a comprehensive communication aid designed to enhance hearing and listening experiences. It consists of two main components: a wireless microphone (T2) and a neckloop receiver (R1). The wireless microphone can be used to pick up sounds and transmit them wirelessly to the neckloop receiver, which is worn around the neck. The neckloop receiver then delivers the audio directly to hearing aids or cochlear implants, providing clear and direct sound transmission. This system is particularly useful for individuals with hearing impairments, offering improved sound clarity and reduced background noise. The Audinor DUO system is designed to be user-friendly and portable, making it suitable for various environments, including educational settings, workplaces, and social gatherings.
goals: To optimize communication and auditory comprehension across diverse contexts.
To facilitate full participation in educational and professional pursuits.
To enhance overall well-being through improved auditory experiences.
To mitigate the impact of hearing loss on daily activities and social interactions.
healthcare_challenges: Difficulty understanding speech in noisy environments.
Need for assistive listening devices to enhance communication.
Challenges in educational and professional settings due to hearing impairments.

original_description: Exciting team games. Inter Cross rods have fiber shank with soft plastic action curve. Overall length: 100 cm Comes in sets of 12 sticks and 6 balls.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Intercross set is a vibrant and engaging collection of sports equipment designed for team games. Each rod in the set features a fiber shank with a soft plastic action curve, providing a comfortable and responsive grip. The rods are 100 cm in length, making them suitable for various games and activities. The set includes 12 sticks and 6 balls, offering ample equipment for multiple players to participate simultaneously. This set is ideal for promoting physical activity and social interaction in a fun and engaging manner.
goals: To promote overall physical well-being through active play.
To cultivate strong interpersonal relationships and collaborative skills.
To encourage strategic thinking and fair play.
To facilitate enjoyable outdoor experiences and recreation.
healthcare_challenges: Motor skill development and coordination difficulties.
Social interaction challenges for individuals with autism spectrum disorder (ASD).
Obesity prevention and management through increased physical activity.

original_description: DressOn with sliding brackets. Width 63.5 cm. Length: 8 cm. Height of the sliding layer: 101 cm. Material: Stainless steel.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The DressOn - Jacket - With Sliding Brackets is a versatile and sturdy assistive device designed to aid individuals in hanging and accessing their clothing with ease. Constructed primarily from stainless steel, this device features a robust frame with sliding brackets that allow for adjustable height, accommodating users of varying statures. The width of the device is 63.5 cm, providing ample space for hanging multiple garments. The length is 8 cm, and the height of the sliding layer can be adjusted up to 101 cm, ensuring that it can be used by individuals ranging from children to adults. The stainless steel construction ensures durability and resistance to corrosion, making it a long-lasting solution for any household.
goals: To promote autonomy in daily dressing activities
To minimize the need for external assistance in managing clothing
To facilitate mobility and accessibility within the home environment
To optimize organizational skills and living space management
healthcare_challenges: Mobility impairments that affect the ability to reach high wardrobes
Arthritis and other conditions that limit hand dexterity
Visual impairments that require easily identifiable and accessible clothing storage
Cognitive impairments that necessitate simple and intuitive clothing management

original_description: Portable and rechargeable luminaire with dimmable LED light, in a slim and futuristic design. Delivers 400 lumens at 3000K, with a color rendition index over 90 Ra.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The LampPad is a sleek, portable, and rechargeable luminaire designed to provide efficient and adjustable lighting. Featuring a dimmable LED light, it delivers 400 lumens at a warm 3000K color temperature, ensuring a cozy and inviting ambiance. The LampPad boasts a color rendition index over 90 Ra, which means it accurately represents colors, making it ideal for various settings including reading, work, and relaxation. Its slim and futuristic design makes it both stylish and functional, suitable for modern interiors. The rechargeable battery ensures portability, allowing users to place it anywhere without the need for cords or outlets.
goals: To elevate the living environment through contemporary, energy-efficient lighting innovations.

original_description:
Suitable for sore feet and diabetes patients. The socks are anatomically formed for optimal fit. Reinforced heel and toe. The socks are made in high quality cotton with no irratating elastic strips. Color: Black or sand
Size: 39-42, 43-46, 47-50.

LLM_output.detailed_description: These knee-length socks are designed to provide comfort and support for individuals with specific healthcare needs. Ideal for those with sore feet or diabetes, the socks feature an anatomically correct design for an optimal fit. They are made from high-quality cotton, ensuring breathability and comfort. The reinforced heel and toe areas enhance durability, while the absence of irritating elastic strips prevents discomfort. Available in black or sand, these socks come in various sizes to accommodate different foot measurements.
goals: Prevent irritation and other diabetes-related complications
Promote overall foot health, enhance daily comfort and support for improved quality of life
Minimize friction and support better blood circulation in the feet for diabetics

original_description: Simpel elastic wrist orthoses with velcro.

LLM_output.detailed_description: A simple elastic wrist orthosis with velcro closure is designed to provide support and stability to the wrist, helping to prevent or correct abnormal movements. It is typically used to treat conditions such as carpal tunnel syndrome, wrist sprains, or other wrist-related injuries. The orthosis is lightweight and easy to wear, making it a convenient option for daily use. It is adjustable to fit various wrist sizes and can be worn under clothing without being too noticeable.
goals: Minimize risk of further injury or discomfort when dealing with wrist-related concerns
Enhance overall well-being by alleviating pain and discomfort for individuals with wrist-related injuries

original_description: Rollatormærke. Flytbart emblem. Aftagelig velcrodel 9,3x11,5 cm. Kan anvendes på hospitalsenge, rollatorer mv.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The item is a portable emblem designed for individuals who use walking aids such as canes or crutches. The emblem is a blue square with a white outline, featuring a white stick figure using a cane. It is intended to be attached to various mobility aids or clothing to indicate the user's need for assistance. The emblem measures approximately 9.3 x 11.5 cm and can be affixed using a hook-and-loop fastener. This item is useful in hospitals, clinics, and other public places to ensure that staff and the public are aware of the user's needs.
goals: To promote personal safety and awareness in public spaces.
To facilitate effective communication of mobility needs to caregivers and the general public.
To foster independence and self-assurance while using mobility aids.
healthcare_challenges: Mobility impairments requiring the use of canes or crutches.

series_name: Radio controlled alarm clock with pillow vibrator
original_description: Alarm clock with radio controlled time setting. Large numbers make it suitable forlow vision and high noise (95 dB) and the pillow vibrator is the choice for people with impaired hearing / deaf. Snooze function with interval. If the clock is placed under / in the same room as your smoke alarm, it may alert you fire.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The item is a radio-controlled alarm clock designed to assist individuals with visual and auditory impairments. It features large, easily readable numbers, making it suitable for those with low vision. The alarm produces a high noise level of 95 dB to ensure it can be heard by individuals with hearing loss. Additionally, it includes a pillow vibrator for those who are deaf or have significant hearing impairments. The clock also offers a snooze function with an interval, providing flexibility for users. If placed under or in the same room as a smoke alarm, it can alert users to a fire, adding an extra layer of safety.
goals: To promote punctuality and readiness for daily routines.
To enhance overall safety and emergency preparedness through multi-sensory alerts.
To foster autonomy and self-reliance in managing daily activities despite sensory impairments.
healthcare_challenges: Individuals with combined visual and auditory impairments.

original_description: Softform Premier: developed in partnership with clinicians. Serves as a high end pressure re-distributing mattr. for mittle to high risk patients and as suppl. to treatment of cat. 1 - 3 pressure ulcers. Practical and durable. High comfort level. Userweight: 0 - 247 kg. Special care for calf and heels.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Softform Premier, formerly known as Superior, is a high-end pressure redistributing mattress designed for middle to high-risk patients. Developed in partnership with clinicians, this mattress features a unique contoured foam insert and is specifically intended to support the treatment of categories 1-3 pressure ulcers. It offers a practical and durable solution with a high level of comfort. The mattress is designed to accommodate users weighing between 0 to 247 kg and features special care zones for the calves and heels to enhance comfort and reduce pressure points.
goals: Promote overall well-being
Ensure pressure redistribution and consequently, optimal comfort and safety during prolonged bed rest
Minimize the risk of pressure ulcers and other bed-related health complications
Improve sleep quality and restfulness

original_description: The municipalities preferred choice for demented and cognitively weak citizens. Only solution remotely operated. The markets simplest operation. Video calls - lifts the handset itself. Digital Calendar, Photo Sharing, Messaging, Clock display, date, time of day, and daily chores. All relatives have free admission. Plug & Play with SIMCard.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Remote Videocall device is designed to facilitate communication and engagement for individuals with dementia and cognitive impairments. This innovative solution allows users to make video calls with ease, featuring a simple and intuitive interface that can be operated with minimal assistance. Key features include a digital calendar, photo sharing, messaging, and a clock display that shows the date, time of day, and daily chores. The device supports unlimited free access for all relatives, making it an ideal tool for maintaining connections with loved ones. It operates on a plug-and-play basis with a SIM card, ensuring seamless connectivity and ease of use.
goals: Foster meaningful connections with family and friends despite cognitive challenges
Promote engagement in daily activities and routines to enhance overall well-being
Improve quality of life through regular communication with loved ones
Empower independence and self-confidence through accessible technology

original_description:
MIA-grab rail for exterior and interior mounting.
Steel pipe coated with Rilsan.
Available in standard or individual dimensions.
Available in black or white.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The MIA grab rail special is a versatile and durable assistive device designed for both interior and exterior mounting. Crafted from a steel pipe coated with Rilsan, it offers a robust and slip-resistant grip. This grab rail is available in standard dimensions as well as custom sizes to fit specific needs. It comes in two color options: black and white, allowing for aesthetic integration into various environments. Ideal for enhancing safety and stability, this grab rail is suitable for use in bathrooms, hallways, and other areas where additional support is required.

To facilitate independence and mobility within living spaces

original_description: Standing and raising aid for mobile residents and patients, who can participate actively during transfer. Internal width legs closed: 36 cm, Internal width legs open: 75 cm. Pivoting seat opening and pedal-operated chassis legs.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Arjo, Sara Stedy is a specialized standing and raising aid designed to assist mobile residents and patients who can actively participate during transfers. This device features a pivoting seat that opens to accommodate the user, along with pedal-operated chassis legs that facilitate easy adjustments. The internal width of the legs can be adjusted from 36 cm when closed to 75 cm when open, providing flexibility to suit different user needs. The device is constructed with a sturdy frame and equipped with wheels for mobility, making it suitable for use in various healthcare settings.

Adjustable thumb opening and 4 velcro bands on the dorsal side.

MY Degrees is a danishtalking thermometer there indicates outside and inside temperature and can be used as a roasting thermometer.

It can be configured as either a 2-post system with wheels or a 4-post system with feet, allowing for flexibility in different environments. original_description:
Included: 
Adjustable leg/footrests for both right and left legs
Height-adjustable leg/footrests
4 cm thick wheelchair cushion
Built-in seat shock absorption
Comfortable armrests
Companion brake
Height-adjustable armrests
Quick-release drive wheels
Low-maintenance pneumatic wheels
Fixed push handles
User seatbelt

LLM_output.detailed_description: The CLASSIC TIM wheelchair with adjustable leg rests is a versatile and comfortable mobility solution designed to enhance the user's experience. This wheelchair features adjustable leg/footrests for both the right and left legs, allowing for customized positioning to suit individual needs. The height-adjustable leg/footrests provide additional comfort and support. Included is a 4 cm thick wheelchair cushion that ensures a comfortable seating experience. Built-in seat shock absorption further enhances comfort by reducing the impact of bumps and uneven surfaces. The wheelchair is equipped with comfortable armrests and a companion brake for safety. The armrests are height-adjustable, offering further customization for the user's comfort. Quick-release drive wheels make it easy to disassemble and transport the wheelchair, while low-maintenance pneumatic wheels ensure durability and smooth movement. Fixed push handles allow caregivers to assist the user effortlessly. A user seatbelt is included to ensure safety during transit.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The MIA toilet paper holder is a versatile and user-friendly assistive technology designed to enhance bathroom safety and convenience. Suitable for use with MIA-toilet armrest models M2-P, M3-P, M4, and M5, this holder can be operated with just one hand, making it ideal for individuals with limited mobility or dexterity. The holder ensures easy access to toilet paper, promoting independence and dignity in personal hygiene routines.

The air purifier operates with 360-degree technology, ensuring comprehensive air purification in all directions. Ideal for both home and office use, the AeroGuard Sense - S helps maintain a clean and healthy indoor environment.

original_description: Ordinary tic tac toe. Suitable for training in occupational therapies. Hygienic as it can be, while washable in an ordinary dishwasher. Available with resp. thin and thick sticks. The colors of the sticks are red and black.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Tic Tac Toe set is a classic game that is often used in occupational therapies to improve fine motor skills, hand-eye coordination, and cognitive abilities. This particular set is designed to be both durable and hygienic, as it can be washed in an ordinary dishwasher. The set includes thin and thick sticks in red and black colors, providing a variety of textures and visual contrast to enhance the gaming experience. The game is suitable for both children and adults, making it a versatile tool for therapeutic and recreational purposes.

original_description:
Finger expander strengthens the fingers as well as the hand muscles.
Individual exercise of each finger is possible and especially promotes coordination of the fingers with each other.
Size: 7 x 7 cm approx.
Quantity: 1 pack
The package contains 3 different levels of difficulty all in the light end

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Finger Expander Easy is a therapeutic tool designed to strengthen fingers and hand muscles. It consists of three pieces of varying difficulty levels, all in the light range, making it suitable for beginners or those with mild hand weakness. Each piece allows for individual finger exercise, which is particularly beneficial for improving finger coordination and overall hand strength. The expander measures approximately 7 x 7 cm and is designed to be compact and easy to use. This product is ideal for individuals looking to enhance their hand dexterity and strength through targeted exercises.

Promote independent living and self-care

original_description: ENJO is a small and strong motor for attendant use for all kind of manual wheelchairs. It only weighs 4 kg and is simple to use. The click on/off system for ENJO takes seconds to do and has never been easier. The mount on the chair is easy detachable if you need to fold your wheelchair for transport or other.

LLM_output.detailed_description: ENJO is a compact and powerful motor designed for attendant use with manual wheelchairs. Weighing only 4 kg, it is lightweight and easy to handle. The motor features a 250W Lithium-ion battery with a two-year warranty and IATA approval for air travel. Its click-on/off system allows for quick and effortless attachment and detachment, making it ideal for users who need to fold their wheelchairs for transport. The device includes a battery indicator, speed control, and a boost function for steep inclines. It is designed to enhance mobility and ease of use for wheelchair users.
goals: Promote autonomy and self-reliance
Support physical wellness and endurance
Foster social integration and community engagement
Streamline travel and transportation
healthcare_challenges: Mobility impairments that affect the ability to propel a manual wheelchair

original_description: Oras Clinica shower faucet is equipped with ergonomic grips that make it easy to operate the faucet safely and easily. The scalding barrier increases the safety, as a key must be used to exceed the temperature limit of 38C.

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Oras Clinica shower faucet is a high-quality, safety-focused plumbing fixture designed to enhance the showering experience. It features ergonomic grips that facilitate easy and safe operation, making it user-friendly for individuals who may have limited dexterity or strength. The faucet includes a scalding barrier that prevents water from exceeding a temperature limit of 38°C, ensuring safety and comfort. This feature requires the use of a key to override the temperature limit, adding an extra layer of safety for users, particularly those with young children or elderly individuals in the household. The sleek and modern design of the faucet complements any bathroom decor, while its durable construction ensures longevity and reliability.
goals: Promote autonomy in personal care
Ensure safety and comfort in personal hygiene
Create a safe and comfortable living environment for all family members
healthcare_challenges: Limited dexterity or strength in hands

Preventing accidents and injuries in the bathroom

Seat Size: 40 cm,

It features adjustable legs that can be customized without the need for tools, accommodating different heights and preferences. original_description:
The flexible adjustment in the back section can encourage 
a posteriorly tilted pelvis into neutral alignment, and the overall design prevents users sliding forward. This gives unsurpassed proximal 
pelvic positioning and support for more complex body sha

LLM_output.detailed_description: The Pelvic Cradle is a specialized seating system designed to provide superior pelvic support and positioning. It features a flexible adjustment mechanism in the back section that encourages a posteriorly tilted pelvis into a neutral alignment, which is crucial for maintaining proper posture and reducing the risk of pressure ulcers. The overall design prevents users from sliding forward, ensuring that the pelvis remains in the optimal position. This cradle is particularly beneficial for individuals with complex body shapes or those who require additional support to maintain proper pelvic alignment.
goals: Promote optimal posture and alignment for overall well-being
Minimize risk of pressure-related injuries and complications
